mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.res_code, a.res_name, a.res_type, a.res_url, a.res_sort, a.group_sort, a.show_flag, a.parent, a.level, a.create_user, a.create_time, a.update_user, a.update_time FROM sys_resources a, sys_ref_user_role b, sys_ref_role_resources c WHERE a.id=c.res_id AND c.role_id=b.role_id AND b.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a.group_sort, a.level, a.res_sort

SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.res_code, a.res_name, a.res_type, a.res_url, a.res_sort, a.group_sort, a.show_flag, a.parent, a.level, a.create_user, a.create_time, a.update_user, a.update_time FROM sys_resources a, sys_ref_role_resources b WHERE a.id=b.res_id AND b.role_id=#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a.group_sort, a.level, a.res_sort
